ch.cpnv.vox.meteor_destroy.states

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.cpnv.vox.meteor_destroy.states.State
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameOverState, GameState, MenuState

    public abstract class State
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the mother class of all our State. They extends of this one and this way we can override the method update / render. Each state is in a stack of the GameStateManager and we will call the update and render method of the first state in the stack.
